markdownRemark.html:
I’ve been digging into the data I got from my user surveys and also taking into account some information I’ve gathered about chatting to people about this project.

I feel like most people I’ve talked to welcome the idea of an app to track your habits. During the chat people always mention that they have something they want to improve on in their life, or that it would be useful for them. These people have mostly been young adults aged around 25.
